00021 #ifndef _DataGroup_HEADER_
00022 #define _DataGroup_HEADER_
00023 
00024 /*! \file DataGroup.h This file provides access to the DataSets in a DataGroup.
00025  */
00026 
00027 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00028 #include <windows.h>
00029 #endif
00030 
00031 #include "calvin_files/data/src/DataException.h"
00032 #include "calvin_files/data/src/DataGroupHeader.h"
00033 #include "calvin_files/data/src/DataSet.h"
00034 #include "calvin_files/portability/src/AffymetrixBaseTypes.h"
00035 //
00036 #include <cstring>
00037 #include <fstream>
00038 #include <string>
00039 //
00040 
00041 
00042 namespace affymetrix_calvin_io
00043 {
00044 
00045 // forward declare
00046 class GenericData;
00047 
00048 /*! This class provides methods to get a DataSet in a DataGroup. */
00049 class DataGroup
00050 {
00051 public:
00052         /*! Constructor
00053          *      @param filename The name of the generic file to access.
00054          *      @param dch The DataGroupHeader of the DataGroup to access.
00055          *      @param handle A handle to the file mapping object
00056          *      @param loadEntireDataSetHint Indicates if DataSets created by DataGroup will attempt to read the entire DataSet data into a memory buffer.
00057          */
00058         DataGroup(const std::string& filename, const DataGroupHeader& dch, void* handle, bool loadEntireDataSetHint=false);
00059 
00060         /*! Constructor
00061          *      @param filename The name of the generic file to access.
00062          *      @param dch The DataGroupHeader of the DataGroup to access.
00063          *      @param ifs An open ifstream object.
00064          *      @param loadEntireDataSetHint Indicates if DataSets created by DataGroup will attempt to read the entire DataSet data into a memory buffer.
00065          */
00066         DataGroup(const std::string& filename, const DataGroupHeader& dch, std::ifstream& ifs, bool loadEntireDataSetHint=false);
00067 
00068         /*! Method to get a reference to the DataGroupHeader
00069          *      @return A reference to the DataGroupHeader.
00070          */
00071         const affymetrix_calvin_io::DataGroupHeader& Header() { return dataGroupHeader; }
00072 
00073         /*! Returns a pointer to the DataSet object by DataSet index.
00074          *  Each call will return a new DataSet object.
00075          *  The caller should call Delete when finished with the DataSet.
00076          *
00077          *      @param dataSetIdx The index of the DataSet to return.
00078          *  @return DataSet
00079          *      @exception affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::DataGroupNotFoundException DataGroup not found.
00080          *      @exception affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::DataSetNotFoundException DataSet not found.
00081          */
00082         affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSet* DataSet(u_int32_t dataSetIdx);
00083 
00084         /*! Returns a pointer to the DataSet object by DataSet name.
00085          *  Each call will return a new DataSet object.
00086          *  The caller should call Delete when finished with the DataSet.
00087          *
00088          *      @param dataSetName The name of the DataSet to return.
00089          *  @return DataSet
00090          *      @exception affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::DataGroupNotFoundException DataGroup not found.
00091          *      @exception affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::DataSetNotFoundException DataSet not found.
00092          */
00093         affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSet* DataSet(const std::wstring& dataSetName);
00094 
00095 protected:
00096         /*! Name of the generic file to access */
00097         std::string filename;
00098         /*! DataGroupHeader of the DataGroup from which to get DataSets*/
00099         DataGroupHeader dataGroupHeader;
00100         /*! A flag the indicates the data access mode.  True = access the data using memory-mapping.  False = access the data using std::ifstream */
00101         bool useMemoryMapping;
00102         /*! File mapping object handle */
00103         void* handle;
00104         /*! An open ifstream object */
00105         std::ifstream* fileStream;
00106         /*! Indicates whether DataSets created by DataGroup should attempt to read all data into a memory buffer. */
00107         bool loadEntireDataSetHint;
00108 
00109 };
00110 
00111 }
00112 
00113 #endif  //_DataGroup_HEADER_
